questions: What are the expected properties for a checkout?
What type of data is expected for the "coupon" property?
What is an example of a valid value for the "value" property?
answer:
## Expected properties.
!!! Tip

    All properties are optional. If any property is missing it will not be processed and no error will be reported.

| Name     | Expected type   | Example                                 |
|----------|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|
| coupon   | string          | "SAVE10"                                |
| value    | string          | "$100.00"                               |
| id       | string          | Checkout ID: "ch_12345"                              |
| order_id | string          | "123abc"                                |
| currency | string          | "USD"                                   |
